extendedInfo.description: ERIEmobile is ERIE Insurance's new auto insurance claim and assistance app for Android!With ERIEmobile, Erie Insurance Customers can:* Quickly contact their ERIE Agent and ERIE Insurance* Collect auto accident claim information* File an auto glass or auto accident claim* Display auto insurance IDCONTACT YOUR AGENT AND ERIE QUICKLY!* Phone numbers, e-mail addresses and directions to your agent's office* Direct phone contact to ERIE for Customer Service, Billing, and Claims ServicesCOLLECT AND FILE AUTO CLAIM INFO:If you have an auto glass claim or are in an accident, ERIEmobile allows you to:* File an auto glass claim* Quickly contact local emergency assistance* Record the accident location* Take accident scene photos or import photos into ERIEmobile* Record voice descriptions of the accident and vehicle damage* Collect witness, injured persons, and police report information* Send accident information to ERIE Insurance to start the claims process or save this information to help you file a claim later.DISPLAY YOUR INSURANCE CARD* This app displays a copy of your insurance card, should you need it.  Proof of Insurance is always with you.  No more fumbling through the glove box!FIND VEHICLE ASSISTANCE, REPAIR SHOPS AND SERVICES* Locate repair facilities or services such as tow trucks, rental cars, gas stations, locksmiths, taxi service, hotels or hospitalsSPECIAL NOTES:An ERIE personal auto policy and an ERIE Insurance Online Account are required to fully access the features offered by this Erie Insurance app.  The Online Account is simply a registration process for ERIE Customers that allows you to connect to your auto policy information with this app.  You would not be able to file a claim without completing this process.If you do not already have an Erie Insurance Online Account, the app will direct you to create a new account.  Be sure to do so right away!  Visit https://www.erieinsurance.com/Account/Create/Default.aspx to set up or modify your online account today.Questions or comments?  Email us: ERIEmobile@ERIEInsurance.com

reviews.title: Decent functionality, poor sync scheduling
reviews.comment: I like features and functionality of the app. However, it very regularly refreshes \"policy information\" in the background when the app is not in use.  I can understand refreshing when I open the app, but I cannot afford the battery drain of the nearly-constant refreshing.
reviews.author: Jeff Eiben

reviews.title: Needs a lot of work.
reviews.comment: Not able to view or pay bills.  Does not allow me to log out.  Uninstalled.
reviews.author: Clint Conner

reviews.title: Cant Retrieve Policy
reviews.comment: Set up log in and everything with my Galaxy S3. Cant retrieve policy....too bad. Would have been a great feature.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What???
reviews.comment: No way to view policy or pay bill. Only enables you to see your insurance card
reviews.author: Cree Swearingen

reviews.title: Unusable
reviews.comment: My credentials work fine to log into my account on the web, but the same credentials fail to work with the app.  Also, when it tries to sync, all my other accounts seem to force sync over and over again, even if configured to sync once a day or not at all.  Had to uninstall.  HTC Droid Incredible.
reviews.author: Bob Duncan

reviews.title: STOP RETRIEVING POLICY
reviews.comment: There is no settings to stop the app from retrieving policy and killing my battery. The app just keeps going all day. I can understand when I open the app, but not when I\'m not using it
reviews.author: Charles Benson

reviews.title: Galaxy III
reviews.comment: It now works on my Galaxy III
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very nice
reviews.comment: Very nice app. for future issues.
reviews.author: Michael Sterback

reviews.title: Small Bug
reviews.comment: Text under icon on home screen disappears for no reason. Weird.
reviews.author: Derek Hummel

reviews.title: Galaxy nexus not working
reviews.comment: My galaxy nexus no longer works with it. I think it broke right after they updated it for ice cream sandwich. Either gives me invalid login credentials or can\'t retrieve policy data. Have uninstalled and reinstalled. To bad before last update it was cool to have all the insurance info readily available.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: OK App
reviews.comment: I would like to see an option to keep the app from running all the time on my droid razor.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Can\'t see or pay bills with app. Also auto-runs in the background trying to connect to the internet. Uses up battery, data, and memory.
reviews.author: Jeremy Osborne

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: Won\'t work it won\'t let me get  past security image
reviews.author: Sami Dinger

reviews.title: Issues with Droid Razr M
reviews.comment: I was unable to retrieve m policy info....huge bummer I would have loved to manage my account from my phone.
reviews.author: Taylor Zurat

reviews.title: Finally
reviews.comment: Finally!  I\'ve been an Erie customer for years and waiting for this app!!
reviews.author: A Google User
